select a.`id` groupId, a.`name`, a.`create_time` groupCreate_time, d.`orderCreate_time`, d.`fee`, d.`first_id`, d.`orderId`, d.`work_code`, d.`orderResolution`, d.`second_id`, d.`serial_number`, d.`orderSize`, d.`status`, d.`orderTask_id`, d.`title`, d.`url`, d.`result`, d.`file_name`, d.`fileCreate_time`, d.`filecode`, d.`fileId`, d.`name`, d.`fileSize`, d.`fileTask_id`, d.`orderDeleted` from task_group a left join ( select b.`create_time` orderCreate_time, b.`fee`, b.`first_id`, b.`work_code`, b.`id` orderId, b.`resolution` orderResolution, b.`second_id`, b.`serial_number`, b.`size` orderSize, b.`status`, b.`task_id` orderTask_id, b.`deleted` orderDeleted, b.`title`, b.`url`, b.`result`, b.`file_name`, c.`create_time` fileCreate_time, c.`filecode`, c.`id` fileId, c.`name`, c.`size` fileSize, c.`task_id` fileTask_id from order_log b left join file c on (b.first_id=c.id or b.second_id=c.id)) as d on a.`id`=d.`orderTask_id` where
d.`serial_number` like concat('%','${param2}','%') or a.`name` like concat('%','${param2}','%') or d.`orderId` like concat('%','${param2}','%') and
(a.`create_time` between '${param3}' and '${param4}') and
d.`orderDeleted`=0 and 1=1 order by a.`create_time` ${param5}

SELECT a.`id` groupId, a.`name`, a.`create_time` groupCreate_time, d.`orderCreate_time`, d.`fee`, d.`first_id`, d.`work_code`, d.`orderId`, d.`orderResolution`, d.`second_id`, d.`serial_number`, d.`orderSize`, d.`status`, d.`orderTask_id`, d.`title`, d.`url`, d.`result`, d.`file_name`, d.`fileCreate_time`, d.`filecode`, d.`fileId`, d.`name`, d.`fileSize`, d.`fileTask_id`, d.`orderDeleted` FROM task_group a LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.`create_time` orderCreate_time, b.`fee`, b.`first_id`, b.`id` orderId, b.`resolution` orderResolution, b.`second_id`, b.`work_code`, b.`serial_number`, b.`size` orderSize, b.`status`, b.`task_id` orderTask_id, b.`deleted` orderDeleted, b.`title`, b.`url`, b.`result`, b.`file_name`, c.`create_time` fileCreate_time, c.`filecode`, c.`id` fileId, c.`name`, c.`size` fileSize, c.`task_id` fileTask_id FROM order_log b LEFT JOIN FILE c ON (b.first_id = c.id OR b.second_id = c.id)) AS d ON a.`id` = d.`orderTask_id` WHERE a.`id` = #{groupId} and d.`orderDeleted` = 0 ORDER BY d.`orderCreate_time` ASC
